[[Naruto]], [[Konohamaru]], and [[Iruka]] throw their [[fūma shuriken]] at the opponent. Then Naruto and Konohamaru perform their Sexy Technique, sending Iruka flying towards the opponent, knocking them out of the sky. Afterwards, Iruka hits both Naruto and Konohamaru in the head.
